001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageEvent;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessagePair;
005import java.util.Optional;
006
007/**
008 * Port that pairs protocol message events into request/response groupings.
009 * <p>Implementations are typically stateful per flow and not thread-safe.</p>
010 *
011 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
012 */
013public interface PairingEngine {
014  /**
015   * Accepts a message event and, when a counterpart is available, emits a {@link MessagePair}.
016   *
017   * @param event message event produced by a reconstructor
018   * @return paired message when ready; otherwise {@link Optional#empty()}
019   * @throws Exception if pairing fails
020   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
021   */
022  Optional<MessagePair> accept(MessageEvent event) throws Exception;
023
024  /**
025   * Releases any resources associated with the pairing engine.
026   *
027   * @throws Exception if cleanup fails
028   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
029   */
030  default void close() throws Exception {}
031}
